00172 void ScheduleAirRaid( AIR_RAID_DEFINITION *pAirRaidDef )
00173 {
00174       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"ScheduleAirRaid");
00175       // Make sure only one is cheduled...
00176       //if ( gfAirRaidScheduled )
00177       //{
00178       //    return;
00179       //}
00180 
00181       // Copy definiaiotn structure into global struct....
00182       memcpy( &gAirRaidDef, pAirRaidDef, sizeof( AIR_RAID_DEFINITION ) );
00183 
00184       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ScheduleAirRaid: raid scheduled for %d",GetWorldMinutesInDay() + pAirRaidDef->ubNumMinsFromCurrentTime ));
00185       AddSameDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_BEGIN_AIR_RAID, ( GetWorldMinutesInDay() + pAirRaidDef->ubNumMinsFromCurrentTime ), 0 );
00186 
00187       gfAirRaidScheduled = TRUE;
00188 }

00191 BOOLEAN BeginAirRaid( )
00192 {
00193       INT32 cnt=0;
00194       BOOLEAN fOK = FALSE;
00195       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00196       gfQuoteSaid = FALSE;
00197       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"BeginAirRaid");
00198       
00199       // OK, we have been told to start.....
00200 
00201       // First remove scheduled flag...
00202       gfAirRaidScheduled = FALSE;
00203 
00204       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"BeginAirRaid: UpdateAirspaceControl");
00205       UpdateAirspaceControl ();
00206 
00207       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"BeginAirRaid: WillAirRaidBeStopped");
00208       if( WillAirRaidBeStopped( gAirRaidDef.sSectorX, gAirRaidDef.sSectorY ) )
00209       {
00210             return( FALSE );
00211       }
00212 
00213       // CHECK IF WE CURRENTLY HAVE THIS SECTOR OPEN....
00214       /*if (      gAirRaidDef.sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && 
00215                         gAirRaidDef.sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && 
00216                         gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
00217       */
00218             // Do we have any guys in here...
00219 
00220             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginAirRaid: check for mercs: first id = %d, last id = %d ",gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID, gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID));
00221             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;   
00222             for ( cnt = 0, pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt < gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++)
00223             {     
00224                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginAirRaid: soldier id = %d, active = %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->bActive));
00225                   if ( pSoldier->bActive  )
00226                   {
00227                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginAirRaid: soldier sectors: x = %d, y = %d, z = %d",pSoldier->sSectorX,pSoldier->sSectorY,pSoldier->bSectorZ ));
00228                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginAirRaid: air raid sectors: x = %d, y = %d, z = %d",gAirRaidDef.sSectorX,gAirRaidDef.sSectorY,gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ ));
00229                         if( pSoldier->sSectorX == gAirRaidDef.sSectorX && pSoldier->sSectorY == gAirRaidDef.sSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ ==   gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ && !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors && pSoldier->bLife && pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT )
00230                         {
00231                               fOK = TRUE;
00232                               break;
00233                         }
00234                   }
00235             }
00236 
00237 
00238             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"BeginAirRaid: do we have some guys in this sector?");
00239             if ( !fOK )
00240             {
00241                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"BeginAirRaid: no we don't");
00242                   return( FALSE );
00243             }
00244 
00245             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"BeginAirRaid: in pre-battle interface?");
00246             // ( unless we are in prebattle interface, then ignore... )
00247             if ( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
00248             {
00249                   return( FALSE );
00250             }
00251 
00252             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"BeginAirRaid: change to the right sector");
00253             ChangeSelectedMapSector( gAirRaidDef.sSectorX, gAirRaidDef.sSectorY, ( INT8 )gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ );
00254             gfQuoteSaid = FALSE;    
00255 
00256             if (  gAirRaidDef.sSectorX != gWorldSectorX || 
00257                         gAirRaidDef.sSectorY != gWorldSectorY || 
00258                         gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ != gbWorldSectorZ || guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
00259             {
00260                   // sector not loaded
00261                   // Set flag for handling raid....
00262                   gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_TRYING_TO_START;
00263                   gfQuoteSaid = TRUE;
00264                   SayQuoteFromAnyBodyInThisSector( gAirRaidDef.sSectorX, gAirRaidDef.sSectorY, ( INT8 )gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ, QUOTE_AIR_RAID );
00265                   SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_EXIT_MAP_SCREEN, gAirRaidDef.sSectorX, gAirRaidDef.sSectorY, gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ, 0,0 );
00266             }
00267             else
00268             {
00269                   gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_TRYING_TO_START;
00270                   gfQuoteSaid                   = FALSE;    
00271             }
00272 
00273             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Incoming Air Strike!" );
00274             LockPauseState ( 22 );
00275             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginAirRaid: setting flags, quote said = %d",gfQuoteSaid));
00276             // Set flag for handling raid....
00277             gfInAirRaid = TRUE;
00278             giNumFrames = 0;
00279 
00280             
00281 
00282             guiRaidLastUpdate = GetJA2Clock( );
00283 
00284             
00285             gbNumDives                    = 0;
00286             gfAirRaidHasHadTurn = FALSE;
00287 
00288             gpRaidSoldier = MercPtrs[ MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS - 1 ];
00289             memset( gpRaidSoldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00290             gpRaidSoldier->bLevel = 0;
00291             gpRaidSoldier->bTeam = 1;
00292             gpRaidSoldier->bSide = 1;
00293             gpRaidSoldier->ubID      = MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS - 1;
00294             gpRaidSoldier->ubAttackerID = NOBODY;
00295             gpRaidSoldier->usAttackingWeapon = HK21E;
00296             gpRaidSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem = HK21E;
00297 
00298             // Determine how many dives this one will be....
00299             gbMaxDives                    = (INT8)( gAirRaidDef.bIntensity + Random( gAirRaidDef.bIntensity - 1 ) );
00300 
00301             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Begin Air Raid." );
00302 
00303 
00304       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"BeginAirRaid: done");
00305       return(TRUE);
00306 }

00309 INT16 PickLocationNearAnyMercInSector( )
00310 {
00311       UINT8 ubMercsInSector[ 20 ] = { 0 };
00312       UINT8 ubNumMercs = 0;
00313       UINT8 ubChosenMerc;
00314       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
00315       INT32 cnt=0;
00316 
00317       // Loop through all our guys and randomly say one from someone in our sector
00318       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"PickLocationNearAnyMercInSector");
00319 
00320       // set up soldier ptr as first element in mercptrs list
00321       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;   
00322 
00323       // run through list
00324       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("PickLocationNearAnyMercInSector: total guys = %d", gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID));
00325       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++ )
00326       {
00327             // Add guy if he's a candidate...
00328             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("PickLocationNearAnyMercInSector: looping %d",cnt));
00329             if ( OK_INSECTOR_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) )
00330             {
00331                   ubMercsInSector[ ubNumMercs ] = (UINT8)cnt;
00332                   ubNumMercs++;
00333             }
00334       }
00335 
00336       // If we are > 0
00337       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("PickLocationNearAnyMercInSector: number of guys %d",ubNumMercs));
00338       if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
00339       {
00340             ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
00341 
00342             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("PickLocationNearAnyMercInSector: chosen guy = %d",ubChosenMerc));
00343             return( MercPtrs[ ubMercsInSector[ ubChosenMerc ] ]->sGridNo );         
00344       }
00345 
00346       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("PickLocationNearAnyMercInSector: no target"));
00347       return( NOWHERE );
00348 }

00350 INT16 PickRandomLocationAtMinSpacesAway( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sMinValue, INT16 sRandomVar )
00351 {
00352       INT16 sNewGridNo = NOWHERE;
00353       INT16 sX, sY, sNewX, sNewY;
00354       INT16 cnt = 0;
00355 
00356       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"PickRandomLocationAtMinSpacesAway");
00357 
00358       sX = CenterX( sGridNo );
00359       sY = CenterY( sGridNo );
00360 
00361       while( sNewGridNo == NOWHERE )
00362       {
00363             sNewX = sX + sMinValue + (INT16)Random( sRandomVar );
00364             sNewY = sY + sMinValue + (INT16)Random( sRandomVar );
00365 
00366             if ( Random( 2 ) )
00367             {
00368                   sNewX = -1 * sNewX;
00369             }
00370 
00371             if ( Random( 2 ) )
00372             {
00373                   sNewY = -1 * sNewY;
00374             }
00375 
00376             // Make gridno....
00377             sNewGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sNewY, sNewX );
00378 
00379             // Check if visible on screen....
00380             if ( cnt < 50 && !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sNewGridNo ) )
00381             {
00382                   sNewGridNo = NOWHERE;
00383             }
00384             cnt++;
00385       }
00386 
00387       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("PickRandomLocationAtMinSpacesAway: grid no = %d",sNewGridNo));
00388       return( sNewGridNo );
00389 }

00391 void TryToStartRaid( )
00392 {
00393       // OK, check conditions,
00394 
00395       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("TryToStartRaid"));
00396       // Some are:
00397 
00398       // Cannot be in battle ( this is handled by the fact of it begin shceduled in the first place...
00399 
00400       // Cannot be auto-bandaging?
00401       if ( gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
00402       {
00403             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("TryToStartRaid: auto-bandaging"));
00404             return;
00405       }
00406 
00407       // Cannot be in conversation...
00408       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV )
00409       {
00410             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("TryToStartRaid: in conversation"));
00411             return;
00412       }
00413 
00414       // Cannot be traversing.....
00415 
00416       // Ok, go...
00417       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("TryToStartRaid: go!"));
00418 
00419       gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_START;
00420 
00421 }

00423 void AirRaidStart( )
00424 {
00425       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AirRaidStart"));
00426       // Begin ambient sound....
00427       guiSoundSample = PlayJA2Sample( S_RAID_AMBIENT, RATE_11025, 0, 10000, MIDDLEPAN );
00428 
00429       gfFadingRaidIn = TRUE;
00430 
00431       // Setup start time....
00432       RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidQuote, AIR_RAID_SAY_QUOTE_TIME );
00433 
00434       gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_LOOK_FOR_DIVE;
00435 
00436       // If we are not in combat, change music mode...
00437       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00438       {
00439             SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_BATTLE );
00440       }
00441 }
00442 
00443 void AirRaidLookForDive( )
00444 {
00445       BOOLEAN     fDoDive = FALSE;
00446       BOOLEAN     fDoQuote = FALSE;
00447 
00448       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AirRaidLookForDive: quote said? = %d",gfQuoteSaid));
00449 
00450       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00451       {
00452             if ( !gfQuoteSaid )
00453             {
00454                   if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( giTimerAirRaidQuote, AIR_RAID_SAY_QUOTE_TIME ) )
00455                   {
00456                         fDoQuote = TRUE;
00457                   }
00458             }
00459       }
00460       else
00461       {
00462             if ( giNumTurnsSinceLastDive > 1 && !gfQuoteSaid )
00463             {
00464                   fDoQuote = TRUE;
00465             }
00466       }
00467 
00468       // OK, check if we should say something....
00469       if ( fDoQuote )
00470       {
00471             gfQuoteSaid = TRUE;
00472 
00473             // Someone in group say quote...
00474             SayQuoteFromAnyBodyInSector( QUOTE_AIR_RAID );
00475 
00476             // Update timer
00477             RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidDiveStarted, AIR_RAID_DIVE_INTERVAL );
00478 
00479             giNumTurnsSinceLastDive = 0;
00480 
00481             // Do morale hit on our guys
00482             HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_AIRSTRIKE, gAirRaidDef.sSectorX, gAirRaidDef.sSectorY, ( INT8 ) gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ );
00483       }
00484 
00485 
00486       // If NOT in combat....
00487       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00488       {
00489             // OK, for now on, all we try to do is look for dives to make...
00490             if ( gfQuoteSaid )
00491             {
00492                   if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( giTimerAirRaidDiveStarted, AIR_RAID_DIVE_INTERVAL ) )
00493                   {
00494                         // IN realtime, give a bit more leeway for time....
00495                         //if ( Random( 2 ) )
00496                         {
00497                               fDoDive = TRUE;
00498                         }
00499                   }
00500             }
00501       }
00502       else
00503       {
00504             // How many turns have gone by?
00505             if ( (UINT32)giNumTurnsSinceLastDive > ( Random( 2 ) + 1 ) )
00506             {
00507                   fDoDive = TRUE;
00508             }
00509       }
00510 
00511       if ( fDoDive )
00512       {
00513             // If we are are beginning game, only do gun dives..
00514             if ( gAirRaidDef.uiFlags & AIR_RAID_BEGINNING_GAME && gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel < DIF_LEVEL_HARD )
00515             {
00516                   if ( gbNumDives == 0 )
00517                   {
00518                         gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_BEGIN_DIVE;
00519                   }
00520                   else if ( gbNumDives == 1 )
00521                   {
00522                         gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_BEGIN_BOMBING;
00523                   }
00524                   else
00525                   {
00526                         gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_BEGIN_DIVE;
00527                   }
00528             }
00529             else
00530             {
00531                   // Randomly do dive...
00532                   if ( Random( 2 ) && gAirRaidDef.uiFlags & AIR_RAID_CAN_RANDOMIZE_TEASE_DIVES )
00533                   {
00534                         gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_BEGIN_DIVE;
00535                   }
00536                   else
00537                   {
00538                         gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_BEGIN_BOMBING;
00539                   }
00540             }
00541             gbNumDives++;
00542             return;
00543       }
00544       else
00545       {
00546             if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00547             {
00548                   if ( giNumGridNosMovedThisTurn == 0 )
00549                   {
00550                         // Free up attacker...
00551                         FreeUpAttacker( gpRaidSoldier->ubID );
00552                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Tried to free up attacker AIR RAID NO DIVE, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
00553                   }
00554             }
00555       }
00556 
00557       // End if we have made desired # of dives...
00558       if ( gbNumDives == gbMaxDives )
00559       {
00560             // Air raid is over....
00561             gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_START_END;
00562       }
00563 }

00571 }

00574 void BeginBombing( )
00575 {
00576       INT16 sGridNo;
00577       UINT32      iSoundStartDelay;
00578 
00579       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginBombing"));
00580 
00581       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00582       {
00583             // Start diving sound...
00584             PlayJA2Sample( S_RAID_WHISTLE, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
00585       }
00586 
00587       gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_BOMBING;
00588 
00589       // Pick location...
00590       gsDiveTargetLocation = PickLocationNearAnyMercInSector( );
00591 
00592       if ( gsDiveTargetLocation == NOWHERE )
00593       {
00594             gsDiveTargetLocation = 10234;
00595       }
00596 
00597       // Get location of aircraft....
00598       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginBombing: pick location, gsDiveTargetLocation = %d",gsDiveTargetLocation));
00599       sGridNo = PickRandomLocationAtMinSpacesAway( gsDiveTargetLocation , 300, 200 );
00600 
00601       // Save X, y:
00602       gsDiveX = CenterX( sGridNo );
00603       gsDiveY = CenterY( sGridNo );
00604 
00605       RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidUpdate, RAID_DELAY );
00606 
00607       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00608       {
00609             iSoundStartDelay = 0;
00610       }
00611       else
00612       {
00613             iSoundStartDelay = TIME_FROM_BOMB_SOUND_TO_ATTACK_DELAY;
00614       }
00615       RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidDiveStarted, iSoundStartDelay );
00616 
00617 
00618       giNumTurnsSinceDiveStarted = 0;
00619 
00620       // Get direction....
00621       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginBombing: get direction"));
00622       gubDiveDirection = (INT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sGridNo, gsDiveTargetLocation );
00623 
00624       gsNumGridNosMoved = 0;
00625       gsNotLocatedYet         = TRUE;
00626 
00627 }
00628 
00629 
00630 
00631 void BeginDive( )
00632 {
00633       INT16 sGridNo;
00634       UINT32      iSoundStartDelay;
00635 
00636 
00637       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginDive"));
00638       // Start diving sound...
00639       PlayJA2Sample( S_RAID_DIVE, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
00640 
00641       gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_DIVING;
00642 
00643       // Increment attacker bust count....
00644       gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
00645       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting attack BEGIN DIVE %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
00646 
00647       // Pick location...
00648       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginDive: pick location"));
00649       gsDiveTargetLocation = PickLocationNearAnyMercInSector( );
00650 
00651       if ( gsDiveTargetLocation == NOWHERE )
00652       {
00653             gsDiveTargetLocation = 10234;
00654       }
00655 
00656       // Get location of aircraft....
00657       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginDive: pick location at min spaces away, gsDiveTargetLocation = %d",gsDiveTargetLocation));
00658       sGridNo = PickRandomLocationAtMinSpacesAway( gsDiveTargetLocation, 300, 200 );
00659 
00660       // Save X, y:
00661       gsDiveX = CenterX( sGridNo );
00662       gsDiveY = CenterY( sGridNo );
00663 
00664       RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidUpdate, RAID_DELAY );
00665       giNumTurnsSinceDiveStarted = 0;
00666 
00667       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00668       {
00669             iSoundStartDelay = 0;
00670       }
00671       else
00672       {
00673             iSoundStartDelay = TIME_FROM_DIVE_SOUND_TO_ATTACK_DELAY;
00674       }
00675       RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidDiveStarted, iSoundStartDelay );
00676 
00677 
00678       // Get direction....
00679       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("BeginDive: get direction"));
00680       gubDiveDirection = (INT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sGridNo, gsDiveTargetLocation );
00681 
00682       gsNumGridNosMoved = 0;
00683       gsNotLocatedYet         = TRUE;
00684 
00685 }
00686 
00687 
00688 void MoveDiveAirplane( FLOAT dAngle )
00689 {
00690       FLOAT                         dDeltaPos;
00691 
00692       // Find delta Movement for X pos
00693       dDeltaPos = MOVE_X * (FLOAT)sin( dAngle );
00694 
00695       // Find new position
00696       gsDiveX = (INT16)( gsDiveX + dDeltaPos );
00697 
00698       // Find delta Movement for Y pos
00699       dDeltaPos = MOVE_X * (FLOAT)cos( dAngle );
00700 
00701       // Find new pos
00702       gsDiveY = (INT16)( gsDiveY + dDeltaPos );
00703 
00704 
00705 }
00706 
00707 
00708 void DoDive(  )
00709 {
00710       INT16       sRange;
00711       INT16       sGridNo, sOldGridNo;
00712 
00713       INT16       sTargetX, sTargetY;
00714       INT16       sStrafeX, sStrafeY;
00715       FLOAT       dDeltaX, dDeltaY, dAngle, dDeltaXPos, dDeltaYPos;
00716       INT16       sX, sY;
00717 
00718       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoDive");
00719 
00720       // Delay for a specific perion of time to allow sound to Q up...
00721       if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( giTimerAirRaidDiveStarted, 0 ) )
00722       {
00723             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoDive: tease or not");
00724             // OK, rancomly decide to not do this dive...
00725             if ( gAirRaidDef.uiFlags & AIR_RAID_CAN_RANDOMIZE_TEASE_DIVES )
00726             {
00727                   //if ( Random( 10 ) == 0 )
00728                   //{
00729                   //    // Finish....
00730                   //    DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoDive: just teasing");
00731                   //    gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_END_DIVE;
00732                   //    return;
00733                   //}
00734             }
00735 
00736             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoDive: locate target");
00737             if ( gsNotLocatedYet && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00738             {
00739                   gsNotLocatedYet = FALSE;
00740                   LocateGridNo( gsDiveTargetLocation );
00741             }
00742 
00743             sOldGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( gsDiveY, gsDiveX );
00744 
00745             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoDive: dive until we are a certain range to target");
00746             // Dive until we are a certain range to target....
00747             sRange = PythSpacesAway( sOldGridNo, gsDiveTargetLocation );
00748 
00749             // If sRange
00750             if ( sRange < 3 )
00751             {
00752                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoDive: end dive");
00753                   // Finish....
00754                   gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_END_DIVE;
00755                   return;
00756             }
00757 
00758             if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( giTimerAirRaidUpdate, RAID_DELAY ) )
00759             {
00760                   RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidUpdate, RAID_DELAY );
00761 
00762                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoDive: move towards target");
00763                   // Move Towards target....
00764                   sTargetX = CenterX( gsDiveTargetLocation );
00765                   sTargetY = CenterY( gsDiveTargetLocation );
00766 
00767                   // Determine deltas
00768                   dDeltaX = (FLOAT)( sTargetX - gsDiveX );
00769                   dDeltaY = (FLOAT)( sTargetY - gsDiveY );
00770 
00771                   // Determine angle
00772                   dAngle = (FLOAT)atan2( dDeltaX, dDeltaY );
00773 
00774                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoDive: move plane");
00775                   MoveDiveAirplane( dAngle );
00776 
00777                   gpRaidSoldier->dXPos     = gsDiveX;
00778                   gpRaidSoldier->sX              = gsDiveX;
00779                   gpRaidSoldier->dYPos     = gsDiveY;
00780                   gpRaidSoldier->sY              = gsDiveY;
00781 
00782                   // Figure gridno....
00783                   sGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( gsDiveY, gsDiveX );
00784                   gpRaidSoldier->sGridNo = sGridNo;
00785                   
00786                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DoDive: figure out grid number, sgridno = %d, soldgridno = %d", sGridNo, sOldGridNo));
00787                   if ( sOldGridNo != sGridNo )
00788                   {
00789                         gsNumGridNosMoved++;
00790                         
00791                         giNumGridNosMovedThisTurn++;
00792 
00793                         // OK, shoot bullets....
00794                         // Get positions of guns...
00795 
00796                         // Get target.....
00797                         dDeltaXPos = STRAFE_DIST * (FLOAT)sin( dAngle );
00798                         sStrafeX = (INT16)( gsDiveX + dDeltaXPos );
00799 
00800                         // Find delta Movement for Y pos
00801                         dDeltaYPos = STRAFE_DIST * (FLOAT)cos( dAngle );
00802                         sStrafeY = (INT16)( gsDiveY + dDeltaYPos );
00803 
00804                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00805                         {
00806                               LocateGridNo( sGridNo );
00807                         }
00808 
00809                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoDive: Fire bullets");
00810                         if ( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16)( GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sStrafeY, sStrafeX ) ) ) )
00811                         {
00812                               //if ( gsNotLocatedYet && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00813                         //    {
00814                               //    gsNotLocatedYet = FALSE;
00815                         //          LocateGridNo( sGridNo );
00816                         //    }
00817 
00818                               //if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00819                               {
00820                                     // Increase attacker busy...
00821                                     //gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
00822                                     //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting attack AIR RAID ( fire gun ), attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
00823 
00824                                     // INcrement bullet fired...
00825                                     gpRaidSoldier->bBulletsLeft++;
00826                               }
00827 
00828                               // For now use first position....
00829 
00830 
00831                               gpRaidSoldier->ubTargetID = NOBODY;
00832                               FireBulletGivenTarget( gpRaidSoldier, sStrafeX, sStrafeY, 0, gpRaidSoldier->usAttackingWeapon, 10, FALSE, FALSE );
00833                         }
00834 
00835                         // Do second one.... ( ll )
00836                         sX = (INT16)( gsDiveX + ( (FLOAT)sin( dAngle + ( PI/2) ) * 40 ) );
00837                         sY = (INT16)( gsDiveY + ( (FLOAT)cos( dAngle + ( PI/2) ) * 40 ) );
00838 
00839                         gpRaidSoldier->dXPos     = sX;
00840                         gpRaidSoldier->sX              = sX;
00841                         gpRaidSoldier->dYPos     = sY;
00842                         gpRaidSoldier->sY              = sY;
00843                         gpRaidSoldier->sGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sY, sX );
00844 
00845                         // Get target.....
00846                         sStrafeX = (INT16)( sX + dDeltaXPos );
00847 
00848                         // Find delta Movement for Y pos
00849                         sStrafeY = (INT16)( sY + dDeltaYPos );
00850 
00851                         if ( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16)( GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sStrafeY, sStrafeX ) ) ) )
00852                         {
00853                               //if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00854                               {
00855                                     // Increase attacker busy...
00856                                     //gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
00857                                     //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting attack AIR RAID ( second one ), attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
00858 
00859                                     // INcrement bullet fired...
00860                                     gpRaidSoldier->bBulletsLeft++;
00861 
00862                               }
00863 
00864                               // For now use first position....
00865                               FireBulletGivenTarget( gpRaidSoldier, sStrafeX, sStrafeY, 0, gpRaidSoldier->usAttackingWeapon, 10, FALSE, FALSE );
00866                         }
00867 
00868                   }
00869 
00870                   if ( giNumGridNosMovedThisTurn >= 6 )
00871                   {
00872                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00873                         {
00874                               // Free up attacker...
00875                               FreeUpAttacker( gpRaidSoldier->ubID );
00876                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Tried to free up attacker AIR RAID DIVE DONE FOR THIS TURN, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
00877                         }
00878                   }
00879 
00880             }
00881       }
00882 }
00883 
00884 
00885 void DoBombing(  )
00886 {
00887       INT16       sRange;
00888       INT16       sGridNo, sOldGridNo, sBombGridNo;
00889 
00890       INT16       sTargetX, sTargetY;
00891       UINT16      usItem;
00892       INT16       sStrafeX, sStrafeY;
00893       FLOAT       dDeltaX, dDeltaY, dAngle, dDeltaXPos, dDeltaYPos;
00894       BOOLEAN     fLocate = FALSE;
00895 
00896       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoBombing");
00897 
00898       // Delay for a specific perion of time to allow sound to Q up...
00899       if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( giTimerAirRaidDiveStarted, 0 ) )
00900       {
00901             // OK, rancomly decide to not do this dive...
00902             if ( gAirRaidDef.uiFlags & AIR_RAID_CAN_RANDOMIZE_TEASE_DIVES )
00903             {
00904                   //if ( Random( 10 ) == 0 )
00905                   //{
00906                   //    // Finish....
00907                   //    DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"DoBombing: just teasing");
00908                   //    gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_END_BOMBING;
00909                   //    return;
00910                   //}
00911             }
00912 
00913             if ( gsNotLocatedYet && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00914             {
00915                   gsNotLocatedYet = FALSE;
00916                   LocateGridNo( gsDiveTargetLocation );
00917             }
00918 
00919             sOldGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( gsDiveY, gsDiveX );
00920 
00921             // Dive until we are a certain range to target....
00922             sRange = PythSpacesAway( sOldGridNo, gsDiveTargetLocation );
00923 
00924             // If sRange
00925             if ( sRange < 3 )
00926             {
00927                   // Finish....
00928                   gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_END_BOMBING;
00929                   return;
00930             }
00931 
00932             if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( giTimerAirRaidUpdate, RAID_DELAY ) )
00933             {
00934                   RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidUpdate, RAID_DELAY );
00935 
00936                   // Move Towards target....
00937                   sTargetX = CenterX( gsDiveTargetLocation );
00938                   sTargetY = CenterY( gsDiveTargetLocation );
00939 
00940                   // Determine deltas
00941                   dDeltaX = (FLOAT)( sTargetX - gsDiveX );
00942                   dDeltaY = (FLOAT)( sTargetY - gsDiveY );
00943 
00944                   // Determine angle
00945                   dAngle = (FLOAT)atan2( dDeltaX, dDeltaY );
00946 
00947                   MoveDiveAirplane( dAngle );
00948 
00949                   gpRaidSoldier->dXPos     = gsDiveX;
00950                   gpRaidSoldier->sX              = gsDiveX;
00951                   gpRaidSoldier->dYPos     = gsDiveY;
00952                   gpRaidSoldier->sY              = gsDiveY;
00953 
00954                   // Figure gridno....
00955                   sGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( gsDiveY, gsDiveX );
00956                   gpRaidSoldier->sGridNo = sGridNo;
00957                   
00958                   if ( sOldGridNo != sGridNo )
00959                   {
00960                         // Every once and a while, drop bomb....
00961                         gsNumGridNosMoved++;
00962 
00963                         giNumGridNosMovedThisTurn++;
00964 
00965                         if ( ( gsNumGridNosMoved % 4 ) == 0 )
00966                         {
00967                               // Get target.....
00968                               dDeltaXPos = BOMB_DIST * (FLOAT)sin( dAngle );
00969                               sStrafeX = (INT16)( gsDiveX + dDeltaXPos );
00970 
00971                               // Find delta Movement for Y pos
00972                               dDeltaYPos = BOMB_DIST * (FLOAT)cos( dAngle );
00973                               sStrafeY = (INT16)( gsDiveY + dDeltaYPos );
00974 
00975                               if ( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16)( GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sStrafeY, sStrafeX ) ) ) )
00976                               {
00977                                     //if ( gsNotLocatedYet && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00978                                     //{
00979                                     //    gsNotLocatedYet = FALSE;
00980                                     //    LocateGridNo( sGridNo );
00981                                     //}
00982 
00983 
00984                                     if ( Random( 2 ) )
00985                                     {
00986                                           usItem = HAND_GRENADE;
00987                                     }
00988                                     else
00989                                     {
00990                                           usItem = RDX;
00991                                     }
00992 
00993                                     // Pick random gridno....
00994                                     sBombGridNo = PickRandomLocationAtMinSpacesAway( (INT16)( GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sStrafeY, sStrafeX ) ) , 40, 40 );
00995 
00996                                     if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00997                                     {
00998                                           fLocate = TRUE;
00999                                           // Increase attacker busy...
01000                                           gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
01001                                           DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting attack AIR RAID ( bombs away ), attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
01002                                     }
01003 
01004                                     // Drop bombs...
01005                                     InternalIgniteExplosion( NOBODY, CenterX( sBombGridNo ), CenterY( sBombGridNo ), 0, sBombGridNo, usItem, fLocate , (UINT8)IsRoofPresentAtGridno( sBombGridNo ) );
01006 
01007                               }
01008 
01009                         }
01010 
01011                         if ( giNumGridNosMovedThisTurn >= 6 )
01012                         {
01013                               if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01014                               {
01015                                     // Free up attacker...
01016                                     FreeUpAttacker( gpRaidSoldier->ubID );
01017                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Tried to free up attacker AIR RAID BOMB ATTACK DONE FOR THIS TURN, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
01018                               }
01019                         }
01020 
01021                   }
01022             }
01023       }
01024 }
01025 
01026 
01027 void HandleAirRaid( )
01028 {
01029       INT32 iVol;
01030       UINT32 uiClock;
01031 
01032       // OK, 
01033       if ( gfInAirRaid )
01034       {
01035             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleAirRaid: air raid mode = %d, quote said = %d",gubAirRaidMode,gfQuoteSaid));
01036 
01037             // are we in meanwhile?
01038 
01039             if ( AreInMeanwhile() )
01040                   return;
01041 
01042             // Are we in TB?
01043             if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01044             {     
01045                   // Do we have the batton?
01046                   if ( !gfHaveTBBatton )
01047                   {
01048                         // Don;t do anything else!
01049                         return;
01050                   }
01051             }
01052 
01053             if( WillAirRaidBeStopped( gAirRaidDef.sSectorX, gAirRaidDef.sSectorY ) )
01054             {
01055                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"HandleAirRaid: SAM just taken over");
01056                   gfFadingRaidOut=TRUE;
01057                   gfFadingRaidIn=FALSE;
01058             }
01059 
01060             // Madd - handle running out of the sector
01061             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleAirRaid: check for mercs: first id = %d, last id = %d ",gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID, gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID));
01062             SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
01063             BOOLEAN fOK = FALSE;
01064             int cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;     
01065             for ( cnt = 0, pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt < gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++)
01066             {     
01067                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleAirRaid: soldier id = %d, active = %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->bActive));
01068                   if ( pSoldier->bActive  )
01069                   {
01070                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleAirRaid: soldier sectors: x = %d, y = %d, z = %d",pSoldier->sSectorX,pSoldier->sSectorY,pSoldier->bSectorZ ));
01071                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleAirRaid: air raid sectors: x = %d, y = %d, z = %d",gAirRaidDef.sSectorX,gAirRaidDef.sSectorY,gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ ));
01072                         if( pSoldier->sSectorX == gAirRaidDef.sSectorX && pSoldier->sSectorY == gAirRaidDef.sSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ ==   gAirRaidDef.sSectorZ && !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors && pSoldier->bLife && pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT )
01073                         {
01074                               fOK = TRUE;
01075                               break;
01076                         }
01077                   }
01078             }
01079             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"HandleAirRaid: do we have some guys in this sector?");
01080             if ( !fOK )
01081             {
01082                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"HandleAirRaid: no we don't");
01083                   gfFadingRaidOut=TRUE;
01084                   gfFadingRaidIn=FALSE;
01085             }
01086 
01087             uiClock = GetJA2Clock( );
01088 
01089             if ( ( uiClock - guiRaidLastUpdate ) >  SCRIPT_DELAY )
01090             {
01091                   giNumFrames++;
01092 
01093                   guiRaidLastUpdate = uiClock;
01094 
01095                   if( gfFadingRaidIn )
01096                   {
01097                         if( guiSoundSample!=NO_SAMPLE )
01098                         {
01099                               if ( ( giNumFrames % 10 ) == 0 )
01100                               {
01101                                     iVol=SoundGetVolume( guiSoundSample );
01102                                     iVol=__min( HIGHVOLUME, iVol+1);
01103                                     SoundSetVolume(guiSoundSample, iVol);
01104                                     if(iVol==HIGHVOLUME)
01105                                                 gfFadingRaidIn=FALSE;
01106                               }
01107                         }
01108                         else
01109                         {
01110                               gfFadingRaidIn=FALSE;
01111                         }
01112                   }
01113                   else if( gfFadingRaidOut )
01114                   {
01115                         if( guiSoundSample!=NO_SAMPLE )
01116                         {
01117                               if ( ( giNumFrames % 10 ) == 0 )
01118                               {
01119                                     iVol=SoundGetVolume(guiSoundSample);
01120 
01121                                     iVol=__max( 0, iVol-1);
01122 
01123                                     SoundSetVolume(guiSoundSample, iVol);
01124                                     if(iVol==0)
01125                                     {
01126                                           gfFadingRaidOut=FALSE;
01127 
01128                                           gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_END;
01129                                     }
01130                               }
01131                         }
01132                         else
01133                         {
01134                                     gfFadingRaidOut=FALSE;
01135                                     gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_END;
01136                         }
01137                   }
01138 
01139                   switch( gubAirRaidMode )
01140                   {
01141                         case AIR_RAID_TRYING_TO_START:
01142 
01143                               TryToStartRaid( );
01144                               break;
01145 
01146                         case AIR_RAID_START:
01147 
01148                               AirRaidStart( );
01149                               break;
01150 
01151                         case AIR_RAID_LOOK_FOR_DIVE:
01152 
01153                               AirRaidLookForDive( );
01154                               break;
01155 
01156                         case AIR_RAID_START_END:
01157                               
01158                               AirRaidStartEnding( );
01159                               break;
01160 
01161                         case AIR_RAID_END:
01162                               
01163                               EndAirRaid( );
01164                               break;
01165 
01166                         case AIR_RAID_BEGIN_DIVE:
01167                               
01168                               BeginDive( );
01169                               break;
01170 
01171                         case AIR_RAID_DIVING:
01172 
01173                               // If in combat, check if we have reached our max...
01174                               if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01175                               {
01176                                     if ( giNumGridNosMovedThisTurn < 6 )
01177                                     {
01178                                           DoDive( );
01179                                     }
01180                               }
01181                               else
01182                               {
01183                                     DoDive( );
01184                               }
01185                               break;
01186 
01187                         case AIR_RAID_END_DIVE:
01188                               
01189                               giNumTurnsSinceLastDive = 0;
01190                               RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidDiveStarted, AIR_RAID_DIVE_INTERVAL );
01191 
01192                               if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01193                               {
01194                                     // Free up attacker...
01195                                     FreeUpAttacker( gpRaidSoldier->ubID );
01196                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Tried to free up attacker AIR RAID ENDING DIVE, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
01197                               }
01198 
01199                               gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_LOOK_FOR_DIVE;                          
01200                               break;
01201 
01202                         case AIR_RAID_END_BOMBING:
01203                               
01204                               RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidDiveStarted, AIR_RAID_DIVE_INTERVAL );
01205                               giNumTurnsSinceLastDive = 0;
01206 
01207                               if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01208                               {
01209                                     // Free up attacker...
01210                                     FreeUpAttacker( gpRaidSoldier->ubID );
01211                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Tried to free up attacker AIR RAID ENDING DIVE, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
01212                               }
01213 
01214                               gubAirRaidMode = AIR_RAID_LOOK_FOR_DIVE;                          
01215                               break;
01216 
01217                         case AIR_RAID_BEGIN_BOMBING:
01218                               BeginBombing( );
01219                               break;
01220 
01221                         case AIR_RAID_BOMBING:
01222                               DoBombing( );
01223                               break;
01224                   }
01225             }
01226 
01227             if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01228             {     
01229                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleAirRaid: in combat"));
01230                   // Do we have the batton?
01231                   if ( gfHaveTBBatton )
01232                   {
01233                         // Are we through with attacker busy count?
01234                         if ( gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount == 0 )
01235                         {
01236                               // Relinquish control....
01237                               gfAirRaidHasHadTurn = TRUE;
01238                               gfHaveTBBatton = FALSE;
01239                               BeginTeamTurn( gubBeginTeamTurn );
01240                         }
01241                   }
01242             }
01243             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleAirRaid: done"));
01244       }
01245 }
01246 
01247 
01248 BOOLEAN InAirRaid( )
01249 {
01250       return FALSE;
01251 //    return( gfInAirRaid );
01252 }
01253 
01254 
01255 BOOLEAN HandleAirRaidEndTurn( UINT8 ubTeam )
01256 {
01257       return( TRUE ); // lal bugfix air raid hangs (remove to enable air raid)
01258 
01259       if ( !gfInAirRaid )
01260       {
01261             return( TRUE );
01262       }
01263 
01264       if ( gfAirRaidHasHadTurn )
01265       {
01266             gfAirRaidHasHadTurn = FALSE;
01267             return( TRUE );
01268       }
01269 
01270       giNumTurnsSinceLastDive++;
01271       giNumTurnsSinceDiveStarted++;
01272       giNumGridNosMovedThisTurn = 0;
01273       gubBeginTeamTurn = ubTeam;
01274       gfHaveTBBatton = TRUE;
01275 
01276       // ATE: Even if we have an attacker busy problem.. init to 0 now
01277       //gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount = 0;
01278 
01279       // Increment attacker bust count....
01280       gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
01281       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting attack AIR RAID, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
01282 
01283       AddTopMessage( AIR_RAID_TURN_MESSAGE, TacticalStr[ AIR_RAID_TURN_STR ] );
01284 
01285       // OK, handle some sound effects, depending on the mode we are in...
01286       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01287       {
01288                   switch( gubAirRaidMode )
01289                   {
01290                         case AIR_RAID_BOMBING:
01291 
01292                               // Start diving sound...
01293                               PlayJA2Sample( S_RAID_TB_BOMB, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
01294                               break;
01295 
01296                         case AIR_RAID_BEGIN_DIVE:
01297 
01298                               PlayJA2Sample( S_RAID_TB_DIVE, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
01299                               break;
01300                   }
01301       }
01302 
01303       return( FALSE );
01304 }

01438 void EndAirRaid( )
01439 {
01440       gfInAirRaid = FALSE;
01441 
01442       // Stop sound
01443       SoundStop( guiSoundSample );
01444 
01445       // Change music back...
01446       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01447       {
01448             SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
01449 
01450             if ( !gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bTeamActive && !gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bTeamActive )
01451             {
01452                   SOLDIERTYPE * pTeamSoldier;
01453                   INT32 cnt;
01454 
01455                   // Loop through all militia and restore them to peaceful status
01456                   cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID;
01457                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
01458                   {
01459                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
01460                         {
01461                               pTeamSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_GREEN;
01462                         }
01463                   }
01464                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition = FALSE;
01465 
01466                   cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID;
01467                   // Loop through all civs and restore them to peaceful status
01468                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
01469                   {
01470                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
01471                         {
01472                               pTeamSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_GREEN;
01473                         }
01474                   }
01475                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition = FALSE;
01476             }
01477 
01478       }
01479       
01480       // OK, look at flags...
01481       if ( gAirRaidDef.uiFlags & AIR_RAID_BEGINNING_GAME )
01482       {     // OK, make enemy appear in Omerta
01483             // Talk to strategic AI for this...
01484             //GROUP *pGroup;
01485             //Create a patrol group originating from sector B9
01486             //pGroup = CreateNewEnemyGroupDepartingFromSector( SEC_B9, (UINT8)(2 + Random( 2 ) + gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel), 0 );
01487             //Move the patrol group north to attack Omerta
01488             //AddWaypointToPGroup( pGroup, 9, 1 ); //A9
01489             //Because we want them to arrive right away, we will toast the arrival event.  The information
01490             //is already set up though.
01491             //DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
01492             //Simply reinsert the event, but the time is now.
01493             //AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, GetWorldTotalMin(), pGroup->ubGroupID );
01494       }
01495             
01496       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Ending Air Raid." );
01497       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"The skies have cleared..." );
01498       UnLockPauseState();
01499 }
